channel.title: CVE Feed for webtoffee -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for webtoffee -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-0957|2024-03-22T02:00:00.179Z -- webtoffee -- WooCommerce PDF Invoices, Packing Slips, Delivery Notes and Shipping Labels
item.description: The WooCommerce PDF Invoices, Packing Slips, Delivery Notes and Shipping Labels plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the Customer Notes field in all versions up to, and including, 4.4.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected invoice for printing.

item.title: CVE-2024-0705|2024-01-19T09:31:18.026Z -- webtoffee -- Stripe Payment Plugin for WooCommerce
item.description: The Stripe Payment Plugin for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL Injection via the 'id' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 3.7.9 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-22288|2024-03-27T05:49:44.419Z -- WebToffee -- WooCommerce PDF Invoices, Packing Slips, Delivery Notes and Shipping Labels
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WebToffee WooCommerce PDF Invoices, Packing Slips, Delivery Notes and Shipping Labels allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WooCommerce PDF Invoices, Packing Slips, Delivery Notes and Shipping Labels: from n/a through 4.4.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-22135|2024-01-24T11:51:37.976Z -- WebToffee -- Order Export & Order Import for WooCommerce
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in WebToffee Order Export & Order Import for WooCommerce.This issue affects Order Export & Order Import for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.4.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-22152|2024-01-24T11:48:56.237Z -- WebToffee -- Product Import Export for WooCommerce
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in WebToffee Product Import Export for WooCommerce.This issue affects Product Import Export for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.3.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-32835|2024-04-24T07:26:03.407Z -- WebToffee -- Import Export WordPress Users
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in WebToffee Import Export WordPress Users.This issue affects Import Export WordPress Users: from n/a through 2.5.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-32834|2024-04-24T08:27:36.842Z -- WebToffee -- WooCommerce Shipping Label
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WebToffee WooCommerce Shipping Label allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WooCommerce Shipping Label: from n/a through 2.3.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-34751|2024-05-16T15:47:13.159Z -- WebToffee -- Order Export & Order Import for WooCommerce
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in WebToffee Order Export & Order Import for WooCommerce.This issue affects Order Export & Order Import for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.4.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-30492|2024-03-29T15:35:25.162Z -- WebToffee -- Import Export WordPress Users
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in WebToffee Import Export WordPress Users.This issue affects Import Export WordPress Users: from n/a through 2.5.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-30231|2024-03-26T11:57:59.743Z -- WebToffee -- Product Import Export for WooCommerce
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in WebToffee Product Import Export for WooCommerce.This issue affects Product Import Export for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-31254|2024-04-10T15:45:11.886Z -- WebToffee -- WordPress Backup & Migration
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in WebToffee WordPress Backup & Migration.This issue affects WordPress Backup & Migration: from n/a through 1.4.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-31235|2024-04-12T13:01:53.767Z -- WebToffee -- WordPress Comments Import & Export
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WebToffee WordPress Comments Import & Export.This issue affects WordPress Comments Import & Export: from n/a through 2.3.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-3546|2024-05-02T16:51:57.352Z -- webtoffee -- WordPress Backup & Migration
item.description: The WordPress Backup & Migration plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the wp_mgdp_populate_popup function in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.8. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access or above, to invoke this function and access log files maintained by the plugin. Additionally, the file name is user-provided and not properly sanitized, which allows attackers to read arbitrary log files on the file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-3216|2024-04-06T03:24:44.171Z -- webtoffee -- WooCommerce PDF Invoices, Packing Slips, Delivery Notes and Shipping Labels
item.description: The WooCommerce PDF Invoices, Packing Slips, Delivery Notes and Shipping Labels plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the wt_pklist_reset_settings() function in all versions up to, and including, 4.4.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to reset all of the plugin's settings.
